update um_user_account
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
pay_total = #{payTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sources = #{sources,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_way = #{sourceWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
love_value = #{loveValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
health_beans = #{healthBeans,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update um_user_account set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, pay_total = #{payTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sources = #{sources,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_way = #{sourceWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, love_value = #{loveValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, health_beans = #{healthBeans,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, head_url = #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.id AS id, u.nick_name AS nickName, REPLACE(u.account_name, SUBSTR(u.account_name,4,4), '****') as accountName, IFNULL(t.buyNum,0) AS buyNum, IFNULL(t.amount,0) AS amount, u.create_time AS createTime, u.remark AS remark FROM um_user_account u LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(buy_account) buyNum ,sum(amount) amount,buy_account FROM om_order WHERE pay_status=1 GROUP BY buy_account) t ON t.buy_account =u.id
AND CONCAT(IFNULL(u.nick_name,''), IFNULL(u.account_name,'')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND u.create_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
